alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FLAGLER... SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near World Golf Village to near Hastings to near Orange Mills. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Vilano Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, and Spuds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
